Data:
Given the user has access to a project in FG WEB
And the user has access to the "Company Library" menu
Action:
When the user adds a document
And sets the category to "Inspection/Audit"
And saves it
Expected Result: Then the document should appear in the list with the corresponding category

Data:
Given the user has access to a project in FG WEB
And the user has access to the "Company Library" menu
Action:
When the user edits the added document
And sets a category different from "Inspection/Audit"
And saves it
Expected Result: Then the document should appear in the list with the corresponding category

Data:
Given the user has access to a project in FG WEB
And the user has access to the "Company Library" menu
Action:
When the user adds a document
And repeats the steps above with different categories
Expected Result: Then the list should display the categories as expected.
